QUICKINSERT.SettingsIndexingSettingsLabe: Configure who can search for what
QUICKINSERT.SettingsSheetFiltersLabel: Choose which filters to use in character sheets
QUICKINSERT.SettingsGmOnlyHint: Only the GMs will be allowed to use Quick Insert
QUICKINSERT.SettingsFiltersSheetsEnabled: Only available for select systems/sheets. Adds Quick Insert search buttons in character sheets, with a relevant filter selected (as configured in the "Character sheet filters" menu)
QUICKINSERT.SettingsQuickOpenHint: Enter a key combination that opens QuickInsert in the active context
QUICKINSERT.SettingsEnableGlobalContextH: Keybind will open Quick Insert in Browse Mode even when there's no context to attach to.
QUICKINSERT.SettingsClickToInsertHint: If disabled, clicking a search result will always show it instead of submitting/inserting
QUICKINSERT.SettingsAutomaticIndexingHin: Automatically index in the background on startup. Indexing during high load may cause errors or slowdowns
QUICKINSERT.SettingsIndexTimeoutHint: Attempt to index each compendium for this amount of time, failing after 4 retries. Try increasing this if some compendiums don't show up in your search attempts.
QUICKINSERT.SettingsSearchButtonHint: Adds a search button in the scene controls on the left side of the scene
QUICKINSERT.SettingsDefaultActionSceneHi: The action that will be performed by default when selecting a scene
QUICKINSERT.SettingsDefaultActionRollTab: The action that will be performed by default when selecting a rollable table
QUICKINSERT.SettingsDefaultActionMacroHi: The action that will be performed by default when selecting a macro
QUICKINSERT.SettingsEmbeddedIndexingHint: Adds individual journal pages to the search index
QUICKINSERT.IndexingSettingsForcesReinde: Updating these settings will force reindexing for all connected clients!
QUICKINSERT.IndexingSettingsHiddenCompen: Hidden compendiums will only show up for GMs, no matter what the table below says.
QUICKINSERT.IndexingSettingsDisabledComp: Compendiums containing disabled document types are automatically disabled, no matter what the compendium pack table says.
QUICKINSERT.FilterListFilterScopeWorld: World (Available to all players in the world)
QUICKINSERT.FilterEditorFilterIsDefault: This is a default filter, you can disable or duplicate it from the list, but it can not be edited.
QUICKINSERT.FilterEditorFilterIsForbidde: This is a world filter, you can disable or duplicate it from the list, but it can only be edited by the GM.
QUICKINSERT.FilterEditorOpenElsewhere: Quick Insert was opened in another editor
QUICKINSERT.SheetFiltersTitle: Customize Quick Insert character sheet filters
QUICKINSERT.SheetFiltersNote: Select the filters to use when clicking Quick Insert links in character sheets.
